answerText: Endgame[10] The maid Liza forces a clock to chime in order to cover up the playing of a piano and a flute by Sophia and Molchalin at the beginning of this Alexander Griboyedov play.
heading: SUBMIT |2014 | Washington, Dartmouth B, GW A | 17 | Literature | Other | College
subject: Literature
question: Question:  [10] Near the end of this play by Samuel Beckett, Clov replaces a picture hanging on the wall with an alarm clock, which is later placed on top of Nagg's trashcan. When asked why this happens, he replies that he is "winding up."
